q_ch: 顾客理大2024年1月的订单包含哪些产品？
q_en: What products are included in PolyU's January 2024 orders?
gt:
Hey there! 😄 Let's take a look at the products included in PolyU's January 2024 orders. Here's a neat table for you:

| Product ID | Quantity | Attributes     | Description |
|------------|----------|----------------|-------------|
| 1          | 100      | Red, M size    | T-shirt     |
| 19         | 240      | Blue, L size   | T-shirt     |
| 3          | 150      | White, XL size | T-shirt     |
| 11         | 220      | Green, M size  | T-shirt     |
| 27         | 260      | Yellow, S size | T-shirt     |

These are the awesome T-shirts that PolyU ordered in January 2024. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'PolyU';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "PolyU"

steps.sql: SELECT p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN ();
steps.description: Retrieve the product attributes and type descriptions for the product IDs from Step3
steps.results: (1064, "You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ')' at line 1")

response:
It seems like there was an issue retrieving the product information for PolyU's "James_WinterOrder" due to a SQL syntax error. 😅 Unfortunately, without the correct data, I can't provide a list of products included in that order.

If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊
